column2: CNFinance Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of home equity loan services. The company is headquartered in Guangzhou, Guangdong and currently employs 2,761 full-time employees. The Companyâ€™s primary target borrower segment is micro- and small-enterprise (MSE) owners who own real properties in Tier 1 and Tier 2 cities in China. The firm aims to serve its target borrowers by facilitating home equity loans and providing tailored services.
44F, Tower G, Gt Land Plaza, No. 16 Zhujiang Dong Rd.
